name: Time Emergence
description:
As monster invades the earth, a secret military group called “T.I.M.E” tried to defend the monster invasion by sending out a highly skilled operatives wearing a suit of armor that is capable of time travel and changing weather. It’s up to him to save the earth and beat the monsters.

Made for IGSI Game Jam 2022

Team Name : PemburuSnackGratis
